title: Which inventions do you think will drive the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: We are due for a massive change in the way we educate pre-K, Grade School and High School students. There will be a new emphasis on learning for one’s self; including topics like investigating the truth of what people say, developing familiarity with mechanical manipulations, early training in computer operation, the rules of conversation ( with shades of the Socratic method ), and more intensive training in speaking, writing, listening and reading. Inventions in this new kind of teaching will be tethered to the classical subjects in a simultaneously philosophical and hands-on approach. New kinds of teachers and classrooms will be needed to begin implementation of this stuff, and working out the bugs with real students.
